info.title: Pure Public API
info.description: Public API for accessing Pure marketplace data including products, spot prices, and more.

get.summary: Get a single product by ID
get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific product

isIra.description: Whether the product is IRA eligible

get.description: Returns detailed information about multiple products specified by comma-separated IDs

isIra.description: Whether the product is IRA eligible

get.summary: List products with pagination and filtering
get.description: Returns a paginated and filtered list of products

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: material
parameters.description: Filter by material (case-insensitive: Gold, Silver, Platinum, Palladium, Bitcoin)

isIra.description: Whether the product is IRA eligible

get.summary: Get a single product by SKU
get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific product using its SKU

isIra.description: Whether the product is IRA eligible

isEsg.description: Whether the manufacturer is ESG compliant

get.description: Returns a list of all product categories with their IDs and titles
Returns a list of all product subcategories with their IDs and titles
Returns a list of all product manufacturers with their IDs and titles

isEsg.description: Whether the manufacturer is ESG compliant

get.description: Returns a list of all certificate providers with their IDs and titles
Returns a list of all product attributes with their IDs and titles
Returns a list of all product materials

get.summary: Get current spot prices for all materials
get.description: Returns the current spot prices, bid/ask spreads, and market status for all precious metals

get.summary: Get a purchase order by ID
get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific purchase order

totalValue.description: Total value of shipment in dollars

get.summary: Get a sale order by ID
get.description: Returns detailed information about a specific sale order

paymentMethod.description: Payment method used for the order

sellerShipped.description: Whether the seller has shipped the item

receivedForInspection.description: Whether the item has been received for inspection

post.summary: Get an authorization token from OAuth code
post.description: Exchange an OAuth authorization code for an access token

code.description: The authorization code received from the OAuth provider

public_key.description: The public key (client ID) for the OAuth application

secret_key.description: The secret key (client secret) for the OAuth application

redirect_url.description: The redirect URL used in the initial authorization request

access_token.description: JWT access token signed with the project's JWKS

expires_in.description: Token expiration time in seconds (defaults to 3600 seconds/1 hour)

id_token.description: JWT ID token returned when openid scope is granted

refresh_token.description: Refresh token returned when offline_access scope is granted

get.description: A test endpoint that requires a valid API key to access

organizationId.description: Organization ID from the API key
